title: Manage Waste Rock Dump Construction
description: A mine operator ensures that waste rock is being placed in the waste dump according to the engineered design.

tasks.description: Review the waste dump design, which specifies the sequence of lifts and the required slope angles.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator is familiar with the current stage of the dump design.

tasks.description: Use GPS on the dozers to monitor that they are pushing the dumped rock to the correct location and creating the designed slope.
tasks.expected_outcome: Real-time data confirms the dozers are building the dump to specification.

tasks.description: Conduct a drone survey at the end of the week to create a 3D surface of the dump and compare it against the design.
tasks.expected_outcome: The survey confirms the dump is being constructed according to the plan.
